# AgencyOS Documentation

> AI Development Team - 14 specialized agents that plan, code, test, and ship production features in minutes

AgencyOS is a comprehensive toolkit built on Claude Code, providing 14 AI agents, 30+ slash commands, and 45 built-in skills to accelerate software development. This documentation covers everything from installation to advanced workflows.

## Getting Started

Essential guides to begin using AgencyOS:

- [Introduction](/docs/getting-started/introduction.md): Overview and value proposition
- [Installation](/docs/getting-started/installation.md): Setup instructions
- [Quick Start](/docs/getting-started/quick-start.md): Ship your first feature in 6 minutes
- [Cheatsheet](/docs/getting-started/cheatsheet.md): Command reference
- [Greenfield Projects](/docs/getting-started/greenfield-projects.md): Starting new projects
- [Brownfield Projects](/docs/getting-started/brownfield-projects.md): Working with existing codebases

## Core Concepts

Understanding AgencyOS's architecture and workflows:

- [CLAUDE.md Configuration](/docs/core-concepts/claude-md.md): Project configuration file
- [Workflows](/docs/core-concepts/workflows.md): Development workflows and orchestration

## CLI Reference

Command-line interface documentation:

- [CLI Overview](/docs/cli/index.md): CLI capabilities
- [Installation](/docs/cli/installation.md): CLI setup
- [ck new](/docs/cli/new.md): Create new projects

## AI Agents

Specialized agents for different development tasks:

- [Agents Overview](/docs/agents/index.md): Complete agent reference

### Planning & Research
- [planner](/docs/agents/planner.md): Research and implementation planning
- [researcher](/docs/agents/researcher.md): Best practices research with parallel search
- [brainstormer](/docs/agents/brainstormer.md): Solution exploration and ideation
- [scout](/docs/agents/scout.md): Codebase navigation and file discovery

### Development & Quality
- [tester](/docs/agents/tester.md): Testing and validation
- [code-reviewer](/docs/agents/code-reviewer.md): Code quality and security review
- [debugger](/docs/agents/debugger.md): Root cause analysis and bug fixing

### Design & Content
- [ui-ux-designer](/docs/agents/ui-ux-designer.md): Interface design and wireframes
- [copywriter](/docs/agents/copywriter.md): Conversion-focused content creation

### Infrastructure & Management
- [database-admin](/docs/agents/database-admin.md): Database optimization and administration
- [git-manager](/docs/agents/git-manager.md): Version control and commits
- [docs-manager](/docs/agents/docs-manager.md): Documentation management and updates
- [project-manager](/docs/agents/project-manager.md): Progress tracking and coordination
- [journal-writer](/docs/agents/journal-writer.md): Decision and progress documentation

## Slash Commands

- [Commands Overview](/docs/commands/index.md): Complete command reference

### Core Commands

End-to-end development workflows:

- [/cook](/docs/commands/core/cook.md): Implement features end-to-end with planning, coding, testing
- [/bootstrap](/docs/commands/core/bootstrap.md): Start new projects with best practices
- [/debug](/docs/commands/core/debug.md): Debug issues with systematic analysis
- [/journal](/docs/commands/core/journal.md): Document decisions and progress
- [/scout](/docs/commands/core/scout.md): Explore codebase and locate files
- [/ask](/docs/commands/core/ask.md): Answer technical and architectural questions

### Fix Commands

Bug fixing and error resolution:

- [/fix:hard](/docs/commands/fix/hard.md): Multi-agent bug fixing for complex issues
- [/fix:fast](/docs/commands/fix/fast.md): Quick fixes for simple issues
- [/fix:types](/docs/commands/fix/types.md): TypeScript type errors
- [/fix:ui](/docs/commands/fix/ui.md): UI and layout issues
- [/fix:ci](/docs/commands/fix/ci.md): CI/CD pipeline failures
- [/fix:logs](/docs/commands/fix/logs.md): Analyze logs and fix issues

### Design Commands

UI/UX design and visual content creation:

- [/design:good](/docs/commands/design/good.md): High-quality UI design with wireframes
- [/design:fast](/docs/commands/design/fast.md): Quick design iterations
- [/design:3d](/docs/commands/design/3d.md): Interactive 3D designs with Three.js
- [/design:screenshot](/docs/commands/design/screenshot.md): Design from screenshots
- [/design:video](/docs/commands/design/video.md): Design from video references
- [/design:describe](/docs/commands/design/describe.md): Describe and analyze existing designs

### Content Commands

Copywriting and content optimization:

- [/content:good](/docs/commands/content/good.md): High-quality conversion-focused copy
- [/content:fast](/docs/commands/content/fast.md): Quick copy generation
- [/content:cro](/docs/commands/content/cro.md): Conversion rate optimization
- [/content:enhance](/docs/commands/content/enhance.md): Improve existing copy

### Documentation Commands

Documentation creation and maintenance:

- [/docs:init](/docs/commands/docs/init.md): Initialize project documentation
- [/docs:update](/docs/commands/docs/update.md): Update documentation after code changes
- [/docs:summarize](/docs/commands/docs/summarize.md): Generate codebase summary

### Git Commands

Version control automation:

- [/git:cm](/docs/commands/git/commit.md): Create conventional commits
- [/git:cp](/docs/commands/git/commit-push.md): Commit and push changes
- [/git:pr](/docs/commands/git/pull-request.md): Create pull requests with descriptions

### Integration Commands

Third-party service integrations:

- [/integrate:polar](/docs/commands/integrate/polar.md): Polar.sh payment integration
- [/integrate:sepay](/docs/commands/integrate/sepay.md): SePay.vn payment integration

### Plan Commands

Planning and analysis:

- [/plan:two](/docs/commands/plan/two.md): Create plan with two alternative approaches
- [/plan:ci](/docs/commands/plan/ci.md): Analyze CI/CD failures and create fix plan

### Skill Commands

Custom skill management:

- [/skill:create](/docs/commands/skill/create.md): Create new custom skills
- [/skill:fix-logs](/docs/commands/skill/fix-logs.md): Fix skill issues from logs

## Built-in Skills

- [Skills Overview](/docs/skills/index.md): Complete skill reference

### Frontend Development

- [Next.js](/docs/skills/nextjs.md): React framework with SSR and SSG
- [shadcn/ui](/docs/skills/shadcn-ui.md): Accessible UI component library
- [Tailwind CSS](/docs/skills/tailwindcss.md): Utility-first CSS framework

### Authentication

- [Better Auth](/docs/skills/better-auth.md): Framework-agnostic authentication

### Database

- [PostgreSQL](/docs/skills/postgresql-psql.md): PostgreSQL database and psql CLI

### E-commerce

- [Shopify](/docs/skills/shopify.md): Shopify apps and integrations

### Design & Media

- [Canvas Design](/docs/skills/canvas-design.md): Visual design and artwork
- [FFmpeg](/docs/skills/ffmpeg.md): Video and audio processing
- [ImageMagick](/docs/skills/imagemagick.md): Image manipulation
- [Gemini Vision](/docs/skills/gemini-vision.md): AI image understanding

### DevOps

- [Docker](/docs/skills/docker.md): Container platform

### Development Tools

- [MCP Builder](/docs/skills/mcp-builder.md): Model Context Protocol servers
- [Skill Creator](/docs/skills/skill-creator.md): Create custom skills
- [Systematic Debugging](/docs/skills/systematic-debugging.md): Structured debugging methodology

### Documentation

- [Document Skills](/docs/skills/document-skills.md): Technical documentation creation

## Use Cases

Real-world examples and workflows:

- [Use Cases Overview](/docs/use-cases/index.md): All use case guides

### Feature Development
- [Adding Features](/docs/use-cases/adding-feature.md): Implement new features end-to-end
- [Building APIs](/docs/use-cases/building-api.md): Create REST and GraphQL APIs
- [Implementing Auth](/docs/use-cases/implementing-auth.md): Authentication systems
- [Payment Integration](/docs/use-cases/integrating-payment.md): Payment gateway integration

### Code Quality
- [Fixing Bugs](/docs/use-cases/fixing-bugs.md): Systematic bug resolution
- [Code Refactoring](/docs/use-cases/refactoring-code.md): Code cleanup and improvement
- [Performance Optimization](/docs/use-cases/optimizing-performance.md): Speed and efficiency improvements

### Project Management
- [Starting New Project](/docs/use-cases/starting-new-project.md): Bootstrap new codebases
- [Maintaining Old Projects](/docs/use-cases/maintaining-old-project.md): Legacy code maintenance

## Troubleshooting

Common issues and solutions:

- [Troubleshooting Overview](/docs/troubleshooting/index.md): All troubleshooting guides
- [Installation Issues](/docs/troubleshooting/installation-issues.md): Setup and installation problems
- [Command Errors](/docs/troubleshooting/command-errors.md): Slash command failures
- [Agent Issues](/docs/troubleshooting/agent-issues.md): Agent execution problems
- [API Key Setup](/docs/troubleshooting/api-key-setup.md): API key configuration
- [Performance Issues](/docs/troubleshooting/performance-issues.md): Speed and performance problems
